review: I love it.  Cancelled cable.  between Hulu and Netflix for $20 buck a month, I don't need cable TV.  saving $80 a month and happy!
author: Robert C. Olander "RC Olander"

review: The quality of the video is bad, if you are used to watching Hi-Def.  This is more like low-def.  It functions as it should, but I don't like having to call up Netflix on my computer and then select my show and stream it to the TV.  And you have to keep the Window open on your computer as long as you watch the show.
author: Peter

review: I am so tired of this piece of crap device. Every ***** time it keeps saying unable to detect a cast, which is b.s. My internet works, my router works, my notepad words. I have done everything the tech support told me to do 5x over. In two months I have been able to watch 2 nights with 58 nights of hell. Do yourself a favor and get amazon firestick or rocu
author: Me
